name: Rockball 2
description:
This is a simple project I made in order to get back into making games. The original Rockball was the last game I made, and due to it's "quality" I ended up taking it down, along with my other projects. Years later, my motivation and time have allowed me to work on my passion once again. I decided to work on a simple project in order to get me back into the swing of development, and an idea instantly sprung... Rockball 2. My goal was to improve on the original from both a visual and technical perspective.

Rockball 2 is a simple 3D platformer, where the goal is to roll, jump, and maneuver through each level. As mentioned, this game sets to improve on the original in every way. Rockball 2 includes:

  • 10 Levels, each with it's own visual theme, and many have a unique gameplay element introduced to them!
  • A Full Soundtrack!
  • Gamepad Support (Limited)!

Although I don't really enjoy the original Rockball enough for me to make it it's own page, I will include an optional download for it for anyone who wants to give it a try (mainly to compare it to the superior Rockball 2).

UPDATE 1.1 CHANGELOG

  • Added new 3d models, provided by @SmallTalkSock on Twitter!

UPDATE 1.1.1 CHANGELOG

  • Slightly adjusted the title screen (More spinners!)
  • Game window can now be resized while in window mode
  • Added normal and height maps to the Rockball texture
  • Adjusted Level 5. Added more platforms to make the level slightly easier
  • Optimized that damn water in Level 7
  • Adjusted Level 9. Added more paths to make it more maze-like
  • Changed Linux executable type to Universal
  • Added Level 0

UPDATE 1.2 CHANGELOG

  • HELL MODE - Play the original 10 levels of Rockball 2, but insanely difficult!
  • Added a new menu for selecting your Level Set, and made it simple to add more in the future (just in case...)
  • Completely reworked Level 6 (and added Hell Mode variant)

I hope you guys enjoy this project!
